resources.string:
Read me!
How to use GYIA codes:
1. Login to KFG Napló
2. Open okostelefonos hozzáférés (GYIA)
3. Új kód at the top
4. Click on the magnifying glass, and read the code w/ a QR-reader (eg. NeoReader). Now copy the link and paste it in the app.
5. Do not forget to change the validity of the code, if it expires the app cannot send notifications any longer!
Copy the link found in the GYIA code! (click here)
